summary: This bill, the 'Promotion and Expansion of Private Employee Ownership Act of 2025,' aims to boost employee ownership of S corporations through Employee Stock Ownership Plans (ESOPs). It includes provisions for tax incentives, establishes a Department of the Treasury office to assist S corporations in setting up ESOPs, amends the Small Business Act to clarify ESOP eligibility, and creates an Advocate for Employee Ownership within the Department of Labor to promote and support employee ownership initiatives.
